greet.greetUser: Hello {{userName}}! The following commands are available:
greet.restCommands:
/language to modify your language
/subscribe receive update of the desired rate
/unsubscribe stop receiving updates from desired rate
/my_subscriptions list all current subscriptions
/start to receive this message

user.noSubscriptions: You currently have no subscriptions. You can subscribe using the command /subscribe
user.subscribe: To which one would you like to subscribe?
user.unsubscribe: From which one would you like to unsubscribe?
user.subscribedSuccessful:
Subscription to $t(rates.{{rateName}}) successfull
You will receive an update if the value changes
user.checkSubs: You can check your subscriptions using the command /my_subscriptions.
user.languageChange: Your current language is $t(app.languages.{{userLang}}). Please select another one to change, or cancel.
user.languageChangeSuccessfull: Your language has been successfully modified!!

error.unrecongnisedCommand: Oops! command not found, to get a list of commands you can use /start.
